grilledCorn.name: Grilled Corn with Cotija and Lime
grilledCorn.description: Grilled corn on the cob coated in tangy mayo, Mexican cotija cheese and doused with fresh lime juice.

spicedVeggies.name: Spiced Grilled Vegatables
spicedVeggies.description: Veggie medley including squash, bell pepper, corn, and artichoke heats. Grilled and tossed with olive oil and our in-house Cajun seasoning blend.

biscuits.name: Buttermilk Biscuits
biscuits.description: Baked fresh daily! Our old-time country biscuits are made with Ma' Hamhock's secret family recipe.

ribs.name: Baby-Back Ribs
ribs.description: Slow-cooked and juicy - guaranteed! The quintessential barbecue test and one that we pass with flying colors.

lamb.name: Grilled Leg of Lamb
lamb.description: Grilled to perfection until its falling off the bone. Served with our mango-mint chutney.

crab.name: BBQ Soft-Shell Crab
crab.description: Flash-boiled and thrown on the grill to sear, these crabs are flown in weekly from Portland, Maine. Served with grilled Vidalia Onions.

peaches.name: Grilled Peaches and Cream
peaches.description: Fresh Georgia peaches halved and grilled for a smoky aftertaste. Served with house-made sweet cream.

bananaBread.name: Grilled Banana Bread Ice-Cream Sandwiches
bananaBread.description: Two slices of house-made banana bread toasted and grilled for a crisp texture. Served with a giant scoop of vanilla-bean ice cream.
